staxel.village.dialogue.intro.Emilia.lin: I don't think we've met yet!
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;! I hope we get along well!
You're the one who helped build me that wonderful house, aren't you?
I'm so happy I could almost cry!
I don't really have much to give you as a thanks, but please, take this!
I'm ^c:1486b0;{0-name}^c:pop;! I hope we can become great friends!
Let me know if you have some free time during the day at some point!
